page.title: 14BRYN-STREET STUDY.
page.content: {CORONATION STREET }NAMED AFTER THE 1937 CORONATION.BUILT IN 1938 TO HOUSE MINERS.HOUSES ON RIGHT,EVEN NOS.4 LOTS OF SEMI-DETACHED,ON THE LEFT,UNEVEN NOS. A TERRACE OF 18 HOUSES.BRICK BUILT,3 BEDROOMS,2 RECEPTIONS,BATHROOM KITCHEN COMBINED,TOILETS OUTSIDE.2 FIR EPLACES,1 UP,1 DOWN. {OCCUPATIONS:} 5 RETIRED;2 HOUSEWIVES;2 FACTORY STAFF 1 COOK;1 CLEANER;1 BAKERY ASST.;1 TRA- INEE MACHINIST. PLACE OF WORK:CARDIFF-1;BRIDGEND-2; PORT TALBOT-5;MAESTEG-1;BRYN-2. {TRANSPORT:} {OWN TRANSPORT:} WORKERS'BUS = 1 CAR = 11 WALK = 2 M/CYCLE= 01 MOTOR CAR = 4 VAN = 01 SERVICE BUS = 4 NONE = 05
